Package se.swedenconnect.sigval.report.validationobjects

Class ValidationObjectProcessor

java.lang.Object
se.swedenconnect.sigval.report.validationobjects.ValidationObjectProcessor
public class ValidationObjectProcessor extends Object
Functions that support creation of validation objects to be included in a signature validation report
Author:
Martin Lindstr√∂m (martin@idsec.se), Stefan Santesson (stefan@idsec.se)

  • Constructor Details

    • ValidationObjectProcessor

      public ValidationObjectProcessor()

  • Method Details

    • includeExplicitSignedDataReferences

      public static <R extends ExtendedSigValResult> void includeExplicitSignedDataReferences(R validationResult, Map<String,ValidationObject> validationObjectMap, String hashAlgo, SignedDataRepresentation signedDataRepresentation) throws NoSuchAlgorithmException
      Create explicit signed document references
      Type Parameters:
      R - the type of ExtendedSigValResult used as input
      Parameters:
      validationResult - signature validation result being the source of validation certificates
      validationObjectMap - the object map being populated with validation object data
      hashAlgo - hash algorithm used to generate hash representations
      signedDataRepresentation - option deciding how and if signed data is represented
      Throws:
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - illegal hash algorithm provided as input parameter

    • storeSigningCertificates

      public static <R extends ExtendedSigValResult> void storeSigningCertificates(R validationResult, Map<String,ValidationObject> validationObjectMap, String hashAlgo, boolean includeChain) throws CertificateEncodingException, NoSuchAlgorithmException
      Create validation objects for all relevant signature validation certificates
      Type Parameters:
      R - the type of ExtendedSigValResult used as input
      Parameters:
      validationResult - signature validation result being the source of validation certificates
      validationObjectMap - the object map being populated with validation object data
      hashAlgo - hash algorithm used to generate hash representations
      includeChain - set to true to include all chain certificates, false to just include signing certificates
      Throws:
      CertificateEncodingException - error in encoding of certificates
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - illegal hash algorithm provided as input parameter

    • getId

      public static String getId(byte[] objectBytes, String hashAlgo, ValidationObjectType validationObjectType) throws NoSuchAlgorithmException
      Get the validation object ID for some referenced data based on data input and data type
      Parameters:
      objectBytes - the referenced data for which the ID is calculated
      hashAlgo - hash algorithm used to create the ID
      validationObjectType - the validation object type used to specify the ID prefix
      Returns:
      ID for the referenced object
      Throws:
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the provided hash algorithm is not supported

    • getId

      public static String getId(TimeValidationResult timeValidationResult, String hashAlgoId)

    • storeTimeValidationObjects

      public static <R extends ExtendedSigValResult> void storeTimeValidationObjects(R validationResult, Map<String,ValidationObject> validationObjectMap, String hashAlgoId, boolean addCertificates) throws NoSuchAlgorithmException
      Add time validation object data to validation objects
      Type Parameters:
      R - the type of ExtendedSigValResult used as input
      Parameters:
      validationResult - signature validation result being the source of validation certificates
      validationObjectMap - the object map being populated with validation object data
      hashAlgoId - hash algorithm used to generate hash representations
      addCertificates - set to true to include time stamp validation certificates, false to just include timestamp references without certs
      Throws:
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - illegal hash algorithm input
